subject: World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Italian defender Marco Materazzi has revealed that he insulted Zinédine Zidane’s sister, explaining nearly two months after the World Cup final what provoked Zidane to head-butt him in the chest.
snippet: The Italian defender Marco Materazzi has revealed that he insulted Zinédine Zidane’s sister, explaining nearly two months after the World Cup final what provoked Zidane to head-butt him in the chest.
